io.github.bananapuncher714.crafters.display

Class ItemDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.bananapuncher714.crafters.display.ItemDisplay

  • public class ItemDisplay
extends java.lang.Object
    The basic unit that is responsible for managing the items that appear on the crafting table If you want to change what appears, you should extend this class and listen for the ItemDisplayCreateEvent; Created on 2017-12-07
    Author:
    BananaPuncher714
